name: DragonFroot Racers - Demo
description:
DragonFroot Racers - Demo Version

By KozyTheCosy (KoZimator)

Thank you so much for playing, I worked pretty hard on it!

A (pretty bad) platformer video game I made about two Vtubers I LOVE - Apricot (Froot) and Zentreya.

This is a fan game, I'm obviously not the creator or the owner of any of the VShojo Vtubers.

also be aware that this is an early build of the game, so it's pretty unfinished at the moment, but I did work hard on it, so please take it with a grain of salt.

Stuff I used:

GameMaker Studio 2

Procreate

MS Paint (Uh... I can explain)

8bitoperator

Ghost recording code by ShaunJS

SFXR
